text: ¬†@gerardcote8391¬†and do you know how many drugs and vaccines are out there that have helped people? Saved lives? Eradicated diseases? Stopped 3rd world country villages from becoming hotbeds and killing off their populations? It‚Äôs just like every single thing else.. there‚Äôs bad that comes with the good. It‚Äôs literally inevitable.. I work in clinical research.. my PI who is a doctor is a republican we both voted Trump but we also know what ACTUALLY happens on the lines down there in clinical research where most people get it wrong‚Ä¶ there‚Äôs bad FDA is absolutely ferocious but WAYYYYYYY before them the pharmaceutical company has to hire on a third party sponsor who is non biased and then the studies are run at site levels who are very very far and separate from both parties the sponsor and pharmaceutical company.. the sponsor is super on top of every tiny thing that happens in clinical research at a site down to a letter missing in paperwork.. the process for every vaccine that comes out is very meticulous and the initial covid vaccine came out under emergency measures so it wasn‚Äôt done exactly the same so I get why people would say it with that one but to say all these other vaccines are now the problem is dangerous to our society and our children and it needs to be stopped because most of the general population has no clue what they‚Äôre talking about and unfortunately even RFK has used a retracted article about vaccines linked to autism .. that is DANGEROUS and I hope he wises up before moving forward because I have high hopes.
